catalogue.message: The application is now stop. You can close your browser or click on the following link to restart it now.
Click here to reconnect to the application
This application can't work without javascript
Not loading. Contact the administrator if the problem persists.

The loading process failed.

This may be due to an issue in your workspace preferences that have been reset.

You can try again or contact the administrator if the problem persists.
Click here to try again to connect to the application.
Click here to edit your profil eimage
Please verify the captcha because there were too many failed attempts with this username

At first launch or after an update,
it is necessary to configure the application.
This message may also appear if
your current configuration is incorrect.

The application could not initialize correctly and started in safe mode.
You should check application's logs and settings.
The application configuration is incomplete or incorrect. Use the configuration tool to complete it.
L'application est en mode sans-échec car un ou plusieurs plugins ont une configuration incorrecte. You can watch logs to know more.
L'application est en mode sans-échec car elle n'a pas pu s'initialiser correctement suite à une erreur. You can watch logs to know more.
L'application est en mode sans-échec car le fichier de configuration 'WEB-INF/param/runtime.xml' n'a pas pu être chargé correctement. You can watch logs to know more.
The application is in safe mode.

This application does not support your browser
or the version you are using{0}.
Here is the list of supported browsers:
Consult the user manual of your application to know the recommended browsers.

The application failed to identify you.
You can try again by refreshing this page
or contact the application administrator if the problem persits.

Your rights are insufficient to access this page.
You can contact the application administrator to know more.
The requested page does not exist.

An error occurred. The page can not be displayed.
You can try again later
or contact the application administrator if the problem persits.

The server is currently unavailable.
Please try again later.
l, F j, Y \\a\\t h:i:s A P
An error occured while processing server response
Server response is incomplete and has no information to continue the process correctly.

Server response is inconsistent and that could come from:
* your authentication that has expired,
* an unknown issue on the server.
You can try to authenticate now before trying again.

If all your data are saved, click on Cancel.

Else you can click on Ok to try to save again your running modifications but your application will be unstable (if you met this message several times, contact your administrator to have details on the problem duration).

The connection to the server is down but the server may still be running your request.

If all your data are saved, click on Cancel.

Else you can click on Ok to try to save again your running modifications but your application will be unstable (if you met this message several times, contact your administrator to have details on the problem duration).
The connection with the server was lost
The application became unstable and has stopped
There is no response from the server
A request left to the server from a few seconds but no response came back.
You can cancel this request or you can wait for a few more seconds.

Data displayed on this tool are not up to date ad can be inconsistent.
\{0\}Click here to refresh the display\{1\}.
Data are not up to date. Click here to refresh this tool.

Data currently displayed are not up to date.

By clicking on the yellow bar you will refresh the view.

The refresh is not automatic for performances purpose.
An unexpected error prevents the required tool to open.
A component had an exception during the process of a message from the bus
A tool had an exception during the automatic refresh process
An error occurred: unable to save preferences.
The save process of the user interface failed
Move has not been made: no possible relationship was found or your rights are insufficients.
The value of this field is too long
An error occurred: unable to insert new item.
The maximum number of entries has been reached, new ones can't be added.
The minimum number of entries has been reached, it can't be deleted anymore.
Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
The number of entries exceeds the number of authorized entries
The number of entries is less than the required number of entries
Are you sure you want to delete with comment ?
An error has occurred on the server. Parameter verifications are now reset.
' has failed. Check the value of this parameter.
Error while performing the parameter verification.

verification have failed.
Press the 'Details' button for further information or see the application's logs.

The verification has failed.
Press the 'Details' button for further information or see the application's logs.
This verification depends on one or more modified parameters. Consider passing this verification to check the modifications.
This test is disabled because all of its linked parameters are disabled or at least one the linked parameters is invalid.
Click to run the verification tests of the configuration parameters.
Lance tous les tests de vérification, quel que soit leur statut actuel.
Run the tests that previously failed.

The tests check the validity of configuration parameters.
Here are the results:
There is no form to save.

One or several fields are invalid.
Please provide correct inputs:

Before saving, it is recommended that all verifications pass.
What do you want to do ?
The following fields contain a warning:
Do you want to proceed anyway?
The password and the confirmation are not the same
Click here to change the password
Click here to change the password
Click here to reset the password to its previous value
Click here to enter a comment.

The title hierarchy is invalid.
You can't enter a Title 2 before a Title 1 (and so on).
Important graphical and accessibility issues can appear if you save now.
This mode allows to edit the content with the rendering closest to the final rendering as the editor wide is adapted
This mode allows to edit the content with a looking close to the final rendering with an edition zone as wide as possible
This mode allows to directly edit the HTML code of the content. Becareful, only a defined list of tags and attributes are allowed.
The current input is not a valid hour.
Only the first 100 users are displayed
Please select a user, in order to proceed.
Sorry, your search produced no results
Only the first 100 groups are displayed
Please select a group in order to proceed.
Sorry, no results matched your search
See all users and groups by inheritance
An error occured : unable to get list of profiles
Add a new SQL data source
Add a new LDAP data source
The search filter must contain at least 3 characters

The Ametys server just reset and this can lead to your application unstability.

You should also restart your application by reloading your browser.
If you have work in progress, you can try to save it.

The Ametys server was updated and restarted. This can lead to your application unstability.

It is STRONGLY recommanded to restart your application by reloading your browser.
If you have work in progress, you can try to save it.
Reload the browser to reset your application

Do you want to reload the application now?

Please save your pending changed before clicking on OK.
An error occurred: unable to display user preferences.

Choose the organization of central tabs:
- one tab per color: opens one tab per color, for a minimum of opened tabs
- one tab per tool: opens one tab per tool
- several tabs per tools: opens many tabs as necessary
Several tabs per tools if necessary
The state of your workspace is saved (opened tools, locations and size of tools). You can reset your workspace.
Checking this checkbox will keep the tool opened after refreshing your browser

Select the display mode of forms:
- Form with tabs: grouping of form fields by tabs
- Linearized form: form fields one after the other on same page
Profile image or photo to display
Reset your workspace with default parameters (opened tools, zones sizes...) and reload the application

Do you want to reset your workspace now?

All currently opened tools will be close: please save your pending changed before clicking on OK.
An unexpected error prevent the workspace to be reset.
Select a profile image among the set of suggested images or by adding a personal image.
A reload of the application is required for the changes to take effect.
An error occurred: unable to display the user profile preferences.
Select picture on your drive, then click 'Ok'.
An unexpected error occurred: the preferences could not been saved.
The profile preferences have beeen saved with success.
Click here to add a local image

Insert file located on your drive, then click 'Ok'.

Select one multimedia file on your drive, then click 'Ok'.

Select one video file on your drive, then click 'Ok'.

Select one flash file on your drive, then click 'Ok'.

Open the notification tool.

A figure on the ribbon icon displays the number of unread message. The color indicates the most serious message type among these unread messages: red for error, yellow for warning, and blue for simple information.
